alert.note: Alert for Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 9:08PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tripp County through 1045 PM CDT... At 1008 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northeast of Witten, or 13 miles northwest of Winner, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ideal around 1015 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
